description: A new study surveying Maui residents found that many experienced a decline in their physical and mental health after the 2023 wildfires.
title: Maui Wildfires Had Severe Health and Economic Consequences on Residents, Study Finds

description: From Queen Charlotte to Peaky Blinders, here are the best TV period dramas that deliver thrills, chills, and lots of romance.
title: The 20 Best Period Dramas to Watch After ‘Bridgerton’

description: Kathleen Galloway-Menke was assaulted May 8 at the center, Ellipsis Iowa.
title: Iowa Center Called Police Nearly 1,000 Times in Three Years Before Teen Killed Staffer, Records Show

description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbot issued a full pardon to a former U.S. Army sergeant convicted of murder for shooting an armed demonstrator in 2020.
title: Texas Governor Pardons Ex-Army Sergeant Convicted of Killing an Air Force Veteran at a Black Lives Matter Protest in 2020

description: Francis Ford Coppola's expensive opus is a lot of things at once, but mostly a reminder that an imaginative mess can be preferable to a safe, tasteful enterprise.
title: Megalopolis Is a Messy, Self-Indulgent Sprawl of Ideas—In the Best Way Possible

description: Yasuke was a samurai, believed to have been of African origin. But his presence in the game sparked a heated debate among fans.
title: Assassin’s Creed Fans Slam Decision to Include Black Samurai in Feudal Japan Story

description: The justices ruled 7-2 that the way the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is funded does not violate the Constitution.
title: Supreme Court Rejects Conservative Attack on the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau

description: Researchers are racing to understand the condition following a surge of interest in Long COVID.
title: Long Dismissed, Chronic Lyme Disease Is Finally Getting Its Moment

description: The Supreme Court rejected a conservative-led attack In a major victory for consumer rights.
title: Supreme Court Sides With Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, Spurning a Conservative Attack

description: Graduating seniors reflect on their college experience that started in isolation and is ending during another period of unrest.
title: Watch: Graduating Seniors Reflect on a College Experience Marred By Isolation and Unrest

description: A proposed rule recognizes the medical uses of cannabis and acknowledges it has less potential for abuse than some of the nation’s most dangerous drugs.
title: Justice Department Formally Moves to Reclassify Marijuana as a Less Dangerous Drug in Historic Shift

description: The Massachusetts teen had a congenital heart defect and died after eating a Paqui chip, which comes in a coffin-shaped box.
title: A Teen Died of Too Much Chile After Eating a Spicy Chip, Autopsy Says

description: TIME spoke to student journalists from UCLA, Columbia, Northwestern and University of Texas at Austin who were on the front lines covering protests on their own campuses. As the unrest grew, student journalists were often best positioned to tell the story although they faced dual challenges—as members of the media and students at the institutions they are covering.
title: Watch: Student Journalists Reflect on Covering Widespread Campus Protests

description: Apple TV+'s bold, thrilling miniseries tells the stranger-than-fiction story of how a Hollywood radical helped Black Panthers leader Huey P. Newton escape the U.S.
title: Black Panthers Meet New Hollywood in the Bold, Thrilling Series The Big Cigar

description: Without the Vietnam War, we might not have 'Toy Story.'
title: The Vietnamese Computer Scientist Who Made Toy Story Possible

description: President Joe Biden has asserted executive privilege over audio of his interview with special counsel Robert Hur.
title: White House Blocks Release of Biden’s Special Counsel Interview, Says GOP Is Being Political

description: A judge decided Wednesday that a Southern California college professor will stand trial for involuntary manslaughter and battery.
title: California College Professor to Stand Trial in Death of Pro-Israel Protester

description: Noem received widespread backlash  when she admitted to shooting and killing her 14-month old dog, Cricket.
title: Trump Speaks Out About VP Hopeful Kristi Noem’s Controversial Dog-Killing Story

description: Australia’s wealthiest person comes under the microscope after unsuccessfully trying to get the National Gallery to remove a painting of her by an acclaimed Aboriginal artist.
title: An Australian Billionaire Tried to Suppress an Aboriginal Artist’s Unflattering Portrait of Her. It’s Only Drawn More Attention

description: For nearly a decade, through our Next Generation Leaders franchise, we've been sharing the stories of trailblazers shaping our future.
title: How TIME Chose Its Spring 2024 Class of Next Generation Leaders

description: Season 3 of "Bridgerton" has some key differences from the book it's based on.
title: Bridgerton Season 3 Is Dramatically Different From the Book. Here’s How

description: Anti-Islam firebrand Geert Wilders and three other party leaders agreed on a coalition deal, capping a half year of tumultuous negotiations.
title: Dutch Government Veers to Far Right With Newly Formed Coalition Dominated by Wilders

description: In the character pseudonymously known as Lady Whistledown, the show finally finds a compelling heroine.
title: Three Seasons In, Bridgerton Finally Has a Great Heroine

description: Gankiewicz, former Miss Hawaii, will hold the title of Miss USA 2023 until August, after previous titleholder Noelia Voigt, former Miss Utah, resigned earlier this month citing her mental health.
title: Savannah Gankiewicz, of Hawaii, Is Crowned Miss USA After Previous Titleholder Resigned

description: Rare but deadly blood clots tied to J&J and AstraZeneca's vaccines were caused by an autoimmune reaction that some people are predisposed to, researchers found.
title: Genetics Played Role in Rare Blood Clots Linked to COVID-19 Vaccines, Researchers Find

description: The mayor suggested that immigrants could help solve the city’s lifeguard shortage because they’re “excellent swimmers,” a remark that sparked outrage among immigrant advocates and confusion among lifeguards.
title: Eric Adams Calling Immigrants ‘Excellent Swimmers’ Sparks Outrage and Confusion

description: A national study asked U.S. employees about their economic wellbeing, including whether they were worried about being able to make rent.
title: Amazon Workers Say They Struggle to Afford Food and Rent

description: Pop superstar Beyoncé gave Vice President Kamala Harris tickets worth $1,656 to one of her shows in 2023.
title: Beyoncé Tickets Among Assets, Income Disclosed by Kamala Harris

description: The closure will clear the way for renovations and construction on the 80-acre property, which is to reopen as the Hard Rock Las Vegas.
title: The Iconic Mirage Casino on the Las Vegas Strip Announces Official Closing Date
